data.name: The Condemned 2
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Randy Orton and Eric Roberts ignite a powder keg of action in this explosive follow-up to The Condemned. After a failed mission to capture the leader of a deadly gambling ring, bounty hunter Will Tanner becomes the hunted—a human target in a game in which contestants must kill or be killed. As high rollers bet on who will survive, Will, his dad, and members of Will's team wage an all-out war against the game's mastermind.
data.about_the_game: Randy Orton and Eric Roberts ignite a powder keg of action in this explosive follow-up to The Condemned. After a failed mission to capture the leader of a deadly gambling ring, bounty hunter Will Tanner becomes the hunted—a human target in a game in which contestants must kill or be killed. As high rollers bet on who will survive, Will, his dad, and members of Will's team wage an all-out war against the game's mastermind.
data.short_description: A bounty hunter becomes the hunted in a high-stakes contest for survival. WWE superstar Randy Orton and Eric Roberts star in this explosive follow-up to The Condemned.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: Intel Core 2 или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 5 Мбит/с для 540p, 3 Мбит/с для 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 10
  • Процессор: Для воспроизведения HD 1080p рекомендуется процессор Intel Core i3+ или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 12 Мбит/с для 1080p или 8 Мбит/с для 720p.
